alert.note: Alert for Clay (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 29 at 8:15PM CDT until May 05 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Buffalo River near Hawley affecting Clay County. .Water levels are starting to rise once again from rain. Buffalo River in Hawley is looking to rise into Minor Flood Stage Saturday afternoon. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Buffalo River near Hawley. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD STAGE. Railroad underpass at US Hwy 10 floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Friday the stage was 7.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 8.6 feet Sunday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
